channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for LA
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for LA

item.title: Report X-2024010837
item.description:
Report X-2024010837

Identified by scraper @ 2024-02-01T15:11:51+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-01-05
  • City: ALEXANDRIA
  • State: LA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: THE PKG WAS WET FROM THE SANITIZER SEEPING OUT OF THE CRACKS OF THE BOX, PLACED THE DAMAGED BOX IN A RED TOTE LINED WITH PLASTIC HAZMAT BAG, IN A VENTILATED AREA DescribePack: THE TOP CAME OFF, ALL OF THE SANITIZER LEAKED OUT DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: PLACED THE DAMAGED BOX IN A RED TOTE LINED WITH PLASTIC HAZMAT BAG, IN A VENTILATED AREA

item.title: Report X-2024010799
item.description:
Report X-2024010799

  • Incident Date: 2023-12-29
  • City: COVINGTON
  • State: LA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package found in MARI trailer for OTP already leaking. Package placed in a damaged hazmat bin to contain spill. DescribePack: Cap was loose and leaked internally DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Leaking package placed in a lined damaged bin
